mapper.sql: SELECT DISTINCT "DbWT3064SaishinsaKetteiMeisai"."toriatsukaiYm" as 取扱年月, "DbWT3064SaishinsaKetteiMeisai"."rirekiNo" as 履歴番号, "DbWT3064SaishinsaKetteiMeisai"."renban" as 決定明細連番, "DbWT3064SaishinsaKetteiMeisai"."jigyoshoNo" as 事業所番号, "DbWT3064SaishinsaKetteiMeisai"."jigyoshoMei" as 事業所名, "DbWT3064SaishinsaKetteiMeisai"."kohiFutanshaNo" as 公費負担者番号, "DbWT3064SaishinsaKetteiMeisai"."kohiJukyushaNo" as 公費受給者番号, "DbWT3064SaishinsaKetteiMeisai"."kohiShokisaiHokenshaNo" as 公費証記載保険者番号, "DbWT3064SaishinsaKetteiMeisai"."serviceTeikyoYm" as サービス提供年月, "DbWT3064SaishinsaKetteiMeisai"."serviceShuruiCode" as サービス種類コード, "DbWT3064SaishinsaKetteiMeisai"."serviceShuruiName" as サービス種類名, "DbWT3064SaishinsaKetteiMeisai"."kagomoushitateJiyuCode" as 申立事由コード, "DbWT3064SaishinsaKetteiMeisai"."kagomoushitateJiyu" as 申立事由, "DbWT3064SaishinsaKetteiMeisai"."saishinsaResultCode" as 再審査結果コード, "DbWT3064SaishinsaKetteiMeisai"."toshoSeikyuTanisu" as 当初請求単位数, "DbWT3064SaishinsaKetteiMeisai"."genshinSeikyuTanisu" as 原審単位数, "DbWT3064SaishinsaKetteiMeisai"."moushitateTanisu" as 申立単位数, "DbWT3064SaishinsaKetteiMeisai"."ketteiTanisu" as 決定単位数, "DbWT3064SaishinsaKetteiMeisai"."choseiTanisu" as 調整単位数, "DbWT3064SaishinsaKetteiMeisai"."hokenshaFutangaku" as 保険者負担額, "DbWT3064SaishinsaKetteiMeisai"."torikomiYm" as 取込年月, "DbWT0001Hihokensha"."meisaiRenban" as 被保険者連番, "DbWT0001Hihokensha"."shoHokenshaNo" as 証記載保険者番号, "DbWT0001Hihokensha"."orgHihokenshaNo" as 被保険者番号, "DbWT0001Hihokensha"."serviceTeikyoYmd" as サービス提供年月末日, "DbWT0001Hihokensha"."orgHihokenshaKanaShimei" as 被保険者カナ氏名, "DbWT0001Hihokensha"."orgHihokenshaShimei" as 被保険者氏名, "DbWT0001Hihokensha"."oldShichosonCode" as 旧市町村コード, "DbWT0001Hihokensha"."henkanHihokenshaNo" as 変換被保険者番号, "DbWT0001Hihokensha"."hihokenshaNo" as 登録被保険者番号, "DbWT0001Hihokensha"."shichosonCode" as 市町村コード, "DbWT0001Hihokensha"."KannaiKangaiKubun" as 管内管外区分, "DbWT0001Hihokensha"."yubinNo" as 郵便番号, "DbWT0001Hihokensha"."choikiCode" as 町域コード, "DbWT0001Hihokensha"."gyoseikuCode" as 行政区コード, "DbWT0001Hihokensha"."gyoseikuMei" as 行政区名, "DbWT0001Hihokensha"."jusho" as 住所, "DbWT0001Hihokensha"."banchi" as 番地, "DbWT0001Hihokensha"."katagaki" as 方書, "DbWT0001Hihokensha"."kanaMeisho" as 宛名カナ名称, "DbWT0001Hihokensha"."meisho" as 宛名名称, "DbWT0001Hihokensha"."shimei50onKana" as 氏名50音カナ, "DbWT0001Hihokensha"."shikibetsuCode" as 識別コード, "DbWT0001Hihokensha"."shikakuShutokuYmd" as 資格取得日, "DbWT0001Hihokensha"."shikakuShutokuJiyuCode" as 資格取得事由コード, "DbWT0001Hihokensha"."shikakuSoshitsuYmd" as 資格喪失日, "DbWT0001Hihokensha"."shikakuSoshitsuJiyuCode" as 資格喪失事由コード, "DbWT0001Hihokensha"."setaiShuyakuNo" as 世帯集約番号 FROM "DbWT3064SaishinsaKetteiMeisai","DbWT0001Hihokensha" WHERE "DbWT3064SaishinsaKetteiMeisai"."renban" = "DbWT0001Hihokensha"."meisaiRenban"

result.column: 公費証記載保険者番号

mapper.insert: CREATE TEMP TABLE "DbWT3063SaishinsaKetteiShukei" ("hdrToriatsukaiYm" rshare."UDD014YM", "hdrRirekiNo" integer, "hdrShoHokenshaNo" character varying, "hdrShoHokenshaMei" character varying, "sakuseiYmd"rshare."UDD015YMD", "kokuhoRengokaiName" character varying, "sinsaiinkaiName" character varying(15), "kaigoKyufuhiSeikyuKensu" integer, "kaigoKyufuhiSeikyuTanisu" numeric(12,0), "kaigoKyufuhiSeikyuFutangaku" numeric(12,0), "kaigoKyufuhiKetteiKensu" integer, "kaigoKyufuhiKetteiTanisu" numeric(12,0), "kaigoKyufuhiKetteiFutangaku" numeric(12,0), "kaigoKyufuhiChoseiKensu" integer, "kaigoKyufuhiChoseiTanisu" numeric(13,0), "kaigoKyufuhiChoseiFutangaku" numeric(13,0), "kogakuKaigoServicehiSeikyuKensu" integer, "kogakuKaigoServicehiSeikyuTanisu" numeric(12,0), "kogakuKaigoServicehiSeikyuFutangaku" numeric(12,0), "kogakuKaigoServicehiKetteiKensu" integer, "kogakuKaigoServicehiKetteiTanisu" numeric(12,0), "kogakuKaigoServicehiKetteiFutangaku" numeric(12,0), "kogakuKaigoServicehiChoseiKensu" integer, "kogakuKaigoServicehiChoseiTanisu" numeric(13,0), "kogakuKaigoServicehiChoseiFutangaku" numeric(13,0), "torikomiYm" rshare."UDD014YM", "hokenshaNo" character varying, "hokenshaMei" character varying )

CREATE TEMP TABLE "DbWT3064SaishinsaKetteiMeisai" ("toriatsukaiYm" rshare."UDD014YM", "rirekiNo" integer, "renban" integer, "jigyoshoNo" rgdb."DbUDD003HokenshaNo", "jigyoshoMei" character varying, "kohiFutanshaNo" character varying(8), "kohiJukyushaNo" character varying, "kohiShokisaiHokenshaNo" rgdb."DbUDD003HokenshaNo", "serviceTeikyoYm" rshare."UDD014YM", "serviceShuruiCode" rgdb."DbUDD005ServiceShuruiCode", "serviceShuruiName" character varying(12), "kagomoushitateJiyuCode" character varying, "kagomoushitateJiyu" character varying, "saishinsaResultCode" character varying, "toshoSeikyuTanisu" numeric, "genshinSeikyuTanisu" numeric, "moushitateTanisu" numeric, "ketteiTanisu" numeric, "choseiTanisu" numeric, "hokenshaFutangaku" numeric, "torikomiYm" rshare."UDD014YM" )

CREATE TEMP TABLE "DbWT0001Hihokensha" ("meisaiRenban" numeric, "shoHokenshaNo" rgdb."DbUDD002HihokenshaNo", "orgHihokenshaNo" rgdb."DbUDD002HihokenshaNo", "serviceTeikyoYmd" rshare."UDD015YMD", "orgHihokenshaKanaShimei" character varying, "orgHihokenshaShimei" character varying, "oldShichosonCode" character varying, "henkanHihokenshaNo" rgdb."DbUDD002HihokenshaNo", "hihokenshaNo" rgdb."DbUDD002HihokenshaNo", "shichosonCode" character varying, "KannaiKangaiKubun" character varying, "yubinNo" rshare."UDD003YubinNo", "choikiCode" rshare."UDD023LasdecCode", "gyoseikuCode" character varying, "gyoseikuMei" character varying, "jusho" character varying, "banchi" character varying, "katagaki" character varying, "kanaMeisho" character varying, "meisho" character varying, "shimei50onKana" character varying, "shikibetsuCode" character varying, "shikakuShutokuYmd" rshare."UDD015YMD", "shikakuShutokuJiyuCode" character varying, "shikakuSoshitsuYmd" rshare."UDD015YMD", "shikakuSoshitsuJiyuCode" character varying, "setaiShuyakuNo" character varying )

INSERT INTO "DbWT3063SaishinsaKetteiShukei" VALUES ( #{取扱年月}, #{履歴番号}, #{証記載保険者番号}, #{証記載保険者名}, #{作成年月日}, #{国保連合会名}, #{審査委員会名}, #{介護給付費_請求_件数}, #{介護給付費_請求_単位数}, #{介護給付費_請求_保険者負担額}, #{介護給付費_決定_件数}, #{介護給付費_決定_単位数}, #{介護給付費_決定_保険者負担額}, #{介護給付費_調整_件数}, #{介護給付費_調整_単位数}, #{介護給付費_調整_保険者負担額}, #{高額介護サービス費_請求_件数}, #{高額介護サービス費_請求_単位数}, #{高額介護サービス費_請求_保険者負担額}, #{高額介護サービス費_決定_件数}, #{高額介護サービス費_決定_単位数}, #{高額介護サービス費_決定_保険者負担額}, #{高額介護サービス費_調整_件数}, #{高額介護サービス費_調整_単位数}, #{高額介護サービス費_調整_保険者負担額}, #{取込年月}, #{保険者番号}, #{保険者名} )

INSERT INTO "DbWT3064SaishinsaKetteiMeisai" VALUES ( #{取扱年月}, #{履歴番号}, #{決定明細連番}, #{事業所番号}, #{事業所名}, #{公費負担者番号}, #{公費受給者番号}, #{公費証記載保険者番号}, #{サービス提供年月}, #{サービス種類コード}, #{サービス種類名}, #{申立事由コード}, #{申立事由}, #{再審査結果コード}, #{当初請求単位数}, #{原審単位数}, #{申立単位数}, #{決定単位数}, #{調整単位数}, #{保険者負担額}, #{取込年月} )

INSERT INTO "DbWT0001Hihokensha" VALUES ( #{被保険者連番}, #{証記載保険者番号}, #{被保険者番号}, #{サービス提供年月末日}, #{被保険者カナ氏名}, #{被保険者氏名}, #{旧市町村コード}, #{変換被保険者番号}, #{登録被保険者番号}, #{市町村コード}, #{管内管外区分}, #{郵便番号}, #{町域コード}, #{行政区コード}, #{行政区名}, #{住所}, #{番地}, #{方書}, #{宛名カナ名称}, #{宛名名称}, #{氏名50音カナ}, #{識別コード}, #{資格取得日}, #{資格取得事由コード}, #{資格喪失日}, #{資格喪失事由コード}, #{世帯集約番号} )
